title: While developing site for IT / ITES / Data Center with additional FSI, support services as defined in the IT Policy - 2023 or amended from time to time, shall be allowed
clause_text: While developing site for IT / ITES / Data Center with additional FSI, support services as defined in the IT Policy - 2023 or amended from time to time, shall be allowed.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: While developing site for IT / ITES / Data Center with additional FSI, support services as defined in the IT Policy - 2023 or amended from time to time, shall be allowed.
